modName: Nightmare Armor-Oblivion- by Hentai -CBBE3 By Nausicaa
summary: Nightmare Armor-Oblivion- by Hentai -CBBE3 By Nausicaa
descriptionHtml:
[b][i] [size=14]Description[/size][/i][/b]

I can't speak english well.

I convert Hentai's Nightmare Armor(Oblivion) to CBBE3.
It was an oblivion mode. Hentai never release it except Naver cafe in Korea.
I am a member of Hentai's Naver cafe in Korea.
It is his remodel of old Nightmare armor in Oblivion.
He released it only Naver cafe (25/6/2011).

It is front view.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3a0fF.jpg[/img]

It is rear view.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7OVJV.jpg[/img]

Here is armor, glove, boots, cape & shoulder pad.
cape & shoulder pad are public.

It is a craftable & smithing at Daedric, DragonScale, Leather.
cape & shoulder pad are craftable at jewelry.

[b][i] [size=14]Video[/size][/i][/b]
By mrkrossfaith
[youtube]6gluLrioDtY[/youtube]

[b][i] [size=14]Update[/size][/i][/b]
1.1 Fix 1stPerson.
Overwrite to 1.0.
It is only mesh file.

[b][i] [size=14]Credit[/size][/i][/b]

Hentai gets credit for Mesh & texture.
I convert only.
author: Nausicaa
